name: Dungeons & Generators
description:
An advanced fullstack project integrating AI-powered procedural content generation for TTRPGs using the OpenAI API.

Features fully custom REST API endpoints built with Firebase Functions (serverless), Express, and Zod for strict schema validation and type-safe request handling.

The project utilizes Cloudflare Workers for global edge proxying, domain routing, and additional security layers. Rate limiting is handled via Upstash Redis using custom-built distributed token bucket algorithms, ensuring scalability under load. Shared TypeScript types are managed across backend and frontend via a monorepo with custom shared packages to maintain type safety throughout the application.

The frontend is built with React and Mantine UI, providing a highly responsive, clean user experience while allowing users to quickly generate, browse, and preview multiple AI-generated magic items simultaneously. Project designed for eventual extensibility into full character, monster, encounter, and location generation.

Key technologies: Typescript, React, Mantine UI, Node.js, Express, Firebase Functions, Cloudflare Workers, Upstash Redis, OpenAI API, Zod, RESTful API Design, SaaS-style architecture.

name: Pocket Viewer

name: Rift Drift
description: A momentum based, infinite drifting game.

name: Spinner
description: A mobile reaction arcade game with single touch controls.

name: QuoteGPT
description: A quote generator where users can select an author and generate inspirational or thought-provoking quotes. Built using React and powered by the OpenAI API.

name: Spellbound
shortDescription: Skill based platformer where you play as a wizards spell book.
description: Spellbound is a unique, skill-based platformer where the player assumes the role of a wizard's spellbook. Created in Unity using C#, the game was developed for a Game Jam. The core mechanic is using the different spells available in the book to overcome various challenges and obstacles.

name: Snowball Fight VR
description: Snowball Fight VR is a virtual reality game developed in Unity using C# and the XR Interaction Toolkit. The game was developed as part of the Holiday VR Jam 2020. It involves the player engaging in a snowball fight against snowmen and building forts for protection. It offers an immersive winter holiday experience.

name: Smart Dots
description: Smart Dots is a maze-solving application built in Java using Processing and the principles of evolutionary computation. The application uses genetic algorithms to evolve a population of 'dots' that learn to navigate through a series of increasingly complex mazes.

name: Mandelbrot Explorer
description: Mandelbrot Explorer is a visualization tool built in Java using Processing. It allows users to explore the intricate patterns of the Mandelbrot set, a complex mathematical object. This project was designed to demonstrate the power and beauty of fractals.
